description: Led a team of 9 eboard members in facilitating 12+ events/workshops per semester, bolstering community engagement, and advancing skills and professional development.
Launched a technical interview program, elevating interview confidence for 86% of participants, enhancing career readiness.
Led coding projects and monthly technical challenges, participated in hackathons with members to build technical skills.
Collaborate in a team of 4 to develop a community-focused web application using the MERN stack, catering to over 200 students.
Maintain the website with resources, ensuring an optimal user experience by monitoring performance and consistent feedback.
Advocated for the interests of my constituents to the SGA by collaborating with various departments on campus.
Communicated concerns or suggestions from international students to the SGA as part of the international students committee.
Promoted SGA as a resource students can utilize.
